targets.query:
from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: ${TIMERANGE})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "e_day" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "e_load_day")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

panels.description: How much power was bought from grid Today

targets.query:
from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_e_total_imp")
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> spread(column: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: [ "_value"])

panels.title: Imported power (Today)

panels.description: How much power was sold to grid Today

targets.query:
from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_e_total_exp")
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> spread(column: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: [ "_value"])

panels.title: Exported power (Today)

panels.description: How much energy from today's consumption was generated by solar panels (ignoring exported power)

targets.query:
meter_e_total_exp = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_e_total_exp")
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> spread(column: "_value")
  |> drop(columns:["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])
  |> last()

e_day = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "e_day")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns:["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])


result1 = join(tables: {e_day: e_day, meter_e_total_exp: meter_e_total_exp}, on: ["type"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value_e_day -  r._value_meter_e_total_exp }))
  //|> yield(name: "result1")

e_load_day = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "e_load_day")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns:["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])

result2 = join(tables: {result1: result1, e_load_day: e_load_day}, on: ["type"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value_result1 / r._value_e_load_day * 100.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> yield(name: "result2")

panels.title: PV efficiency (Today)

panels.description:
Generated power minus exported power
(for exported power is different price)

targets.query:
import "math"
today_overall = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "e_day")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])
  |> last()
  //|> yield(name: "overall")

today_exported = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_e_total_exp")
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> spread(column: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])
  |> last()
  //|> yield(name: "exported")
  
today = join(tables: {today_overall: today_overall, today_exported: today_exported}, on: ["type"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (math.round(x: ((r._value_today_overall - r._value_today_exported) * ${PRICE_PER_KW} * ${CURRENCY}) * 1.0) / 1.0),}),)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: string(v: r._value) + " ${CURRENCY:text}"}))
  |> yield(name: "result")

panels.title: Saved money (Today)

targets.query:
import "math"
from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_e_total_exp")
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> spread(column: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: [ "_value"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (math.round(x: (r._value * ${EXPORT_PRICE} * ${CURRENCY}) * 10.0) / 10.0),}),)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: string(v: r._value) + " ${CURRENCY:text}"}))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "e_load_total")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Total Power Usage today" }))

panels.description: How much power was bought from grid in total
panels.title: Total imported power

panels.description: How much power was sold to grid in total
panels.title: Total exporter power

panels.description: How much energy from total consumption was generated by solar panels (ignoring exported power)

targets.query:
meter_e_total_exp = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_e_total_exp")
  |> drop(columns:["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])
  |> last()
  //|> yield(name: "meter_e_total_exp")

e_total = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "e_total")
  |> drop(columns:["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])
  |> last()
  //|> yield(name: "e_total")

result1 = join(tables: {e_total: e_total, meter_e_total_exp: meter_e_total_exp}, on: ["type"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value_e_total -  r._value_meter_e_total_exp }))
  //|> yield(name: "result1")

e_load_total = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "e_load_total")
  |> drop(columns:["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])
  |> last()
  
result2 = join(tables: {result1: result1, e_load_total: e_load_total}, on: ["type"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value_result1 / r._value_e_load_total * 100.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> yield(name: "result2")

panels.title: Total PV efficiency

targets.query:
import "math"
total_generated = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "e_total")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])
  |> last()
  //|> yield(name: "overall")

total_exported = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_e_total_exp")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])
  |> last()
  //|> yield(name: "exported")
  
today = join(tables: {total_generated: total_generated, total_exported: total_exported}, on: ["type"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (math.round(x: ((r._value_total_generated - r._value_total_exported) * ${PRICE_PER_KW} * ${CURRENCY}) * 1.0) / 1.0),}),)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: string(v: r._value) + " ${CURRENCY:text}"}))
  |> yield(name: "result")

import "math"
from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_e_total_exp")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (math.round(x: (r._value * ${EXPORT_PRICE} * ${CURRENCY}) * 10.0) / 10.0),}),)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: string(v: r._value) + " ${CURRENCY:text}"}))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_temperature")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Battery Temperature:" }))

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  value AS "outside temperature"
FROM meteo
where type = "outside_temp"

targets.query:
from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>r._field == "load_ptotal")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Current Power Usage:" }))

panels.description:
Negative value = Buying from grid</br>
Positive value⠀= Sending to grid
panels.title: Power from Grid

panels.description:
Negative value = Charging</br>
Positive value⠀= Discharging
panels.title: Battery Power Status

matcher.options: Battery State of Charge battery_soc FVE

targets.query:
import "math"
battery_mode = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_mode")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])
  |> last()
  |> map(
      fn: (r) => ({r with
          _value: if r._value == 1 then
              "Standby"
          else if r._value == 2 then
              "Discharge"
          else if r._value == 3 then
              "Charging"
          else
              "Unknown"
      }),
  )
  //|> yield(name: "battery_status")

battery_soc = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_soc")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])
  |> last()
  //|> yield(name: "battery_soc")
  
result = join(tables: {battery_mode: battery_mode, battery_soc: battery_soc}, on: ["type"])
   |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: string(v: r._value_battery_mode) + ": " + string(v: r._value_battery_soc) + "%" }))
   |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
   |> yield(name: "result")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>r._field == "load_p1")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Load L1 (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>r._field == "load_p2")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Load L2 (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>r._field == "load_p3")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Load L3 (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active_power1")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Active Power L1 (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active_power2")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Active Power L2 (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active_power3")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Active Power L3 (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pbattery1")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Battery Total (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ppv")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Generated power (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "e_load_day")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Load (W)" }))

import "math"
from(bucket: "FVE_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_e_total_imp")
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> spread(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: r._stop}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (math.round(x: (r._value) * 100.0) / 100.0),}),)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Imported power (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_soc")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn:last)

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "e_day")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Generated power (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>r._field == "load_ptotal")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Load (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>r._field == "active_power_total" )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Meter - Grid (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>r._field == "pbattery1")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Battery (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ppv" )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"PV -Generating power (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_soc")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Batter State of Charge (SOC) (%)" }))

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  id
FROM elektro
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp
